p: The reduction in the CHIKV infectivity in the presence of 5c and 5d compounds was assessed by plaque reduction assay. In the case of 5c-compound-treated CHIKV, virus inhibition was observed nearly up to 95% at 70 μM, 88% at 50 μM, and 80% at 30 μM concentration, while 5d-treated-CHIKV showed 92% at 70 μM, 86% at 50 μM, and 84% at 30 μM, as compared to control ( Figure 3 ). Other compounds ( 5a, 5b, 5e, and 5f) did not show inhibition of CHIKV.
